PORT_CHANNEL_TEST.desc: Configure a member port in PORT_CHANNEL table.

PORT_CHANNEL_MAX_VALID_MIN_LINKS.desc: Configure PortChannel with maximum valid value of min-links.

PORT_CHANNEL_OUT_OF_RANGE_MIN_LINKS.desc: Configure PortChannel with greater than maximum valid value of min-links.

PORT_CHANNEL_WRONG_TPID_PATTERN.desc: INCORRECT PORTCHANNEL TPID IN PORT_CHANNEL TABLE.

PORT_CHANNEL_INVALID_FALLBACK.desc: INCORRECT PORTCHANNEL FALLBACK IN PORT_CHANNEL TABLE.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_IP_ADDR_TEST.desc: Configure IP address on PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE table.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_IP_ADDR_ON_NON_EXI.desc: Configure IP address on a non existent PortChannel.

PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORTCH.desc: Configure PortChannel in PORTCHANNEL_MEMEBER table which does not exist in PORTCHANNEL table.

PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORT.desc: Configure Port in PORTCHANNEL_MEMEBER table which does not exist in PORT table.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_LIST_VRF_TEST.desc: Configure Vrf name in PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE table.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_LIST_VRF_TEST_ON_N.desc: Configure vrf name on a non existent PortChannel.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_LIST_NON_EXIST_VRF.desc: Configure a non existent Vrf in PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE table.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RAN.desc: Configure wrong value for nat zone.
PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RAN.eStr: Invalid nat zone for the portchannel interface.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_VALID_NAT_ZONE_RAN.desc: Configure valid value for nat zone.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_INVALID_LOOPBACK_A.desc: INCORRECT LOOPBACK ACTION IN PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE TABLE.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_INVALID_ENABLE_IPV.desc: Enable the ipv6 link-local as true.
